quotes.quote: I abhor the idea of a perfect world. It would bore me to tears.
Perhaps the world's second worst crime is boredom. The first is being a bore.
I would rather die of passion than of boredom.
If you're bored with life – you don't get up every morning with a burning desire to do things – you don't have enough goals.
The truth is that everyone is bored, and devotes himself to cultivating habits.
Boredom is not an end-product, it is comparatively rather an early stage in life and art. You've got to go by or past or through boredom, as through a filter, before the clear product emerges.
When you're bored with yourself, marry and be bored with someone else.
Boredom is the conviction that you can't change. The shriek of unused capacities.
The life of the creative man is lead, directed and controlled by boredom. Avoiding boredom is one of our most important purposes.
Boredom between two people doesn't come from being together physically. It comes from being apart mentally and spiritually.
There's no excuse to be bored. Sad, yes. Angry, yes. Depressed, yes. Crazy, yes. But there's no excuse for boredom, ever.
Human beings make life so interesting. Do you know, that in a universe so full of wonders, they have managed to invent boredom.
The concept of boredom entails an inability to use up present moments in a personally fulfilling way.
Against boredom the gods themselves fight in vain.

Boredom is your window on the properties of time that one tends to ignore to the likely peril of one's mental equilibrium. It is your window on time's infinity. Once this window opens, don't try to shut it; on the contrary, throw it wide open.
Are you bored with life? Then throw yourself into some work you believe in with all your heart, live for it, die for it, and you will find happiness that you had thought could never be yours.
A bore is a person who opens his mouth and puts his feats in it.

Patience and boredom are closely related. Boredom, a certain kind of boredom, is really impatience. You don't like the way things are, they aren't interesting enough for you, so you decide – and boredom is a decision – that you are bored.
You ought not to be ashamed of being bored. What you ought to be ashamed of is being boring.
I want to feel something, as a person. I don't want to be bored.
All kinds are good except the kind that bores you.
Boredom comes from a boring mind.
I dreaded having a boring life when I grew up. And I certainly can't complain about being bored.
Boredom can be a lethal thing on a small island.
There is something more terrible than a hell of suffering – a hell of boredom.
You don't burn out from going too fast. You burn out from going too slow and getting bored.
There are no uninteresting things, only uninterested people.
Being bored is an insult to oneself.
I'm terrified of being bored and not learning.
The cure for boredom is curiosity. There is no cure for curiosity.
Boredom and fatigue are great historical forces.
Staying busy keeps me away from being bored, which used to be a lot of my problem.
I want to be bored. But I can't. But I really don't want to be this thing that I'm having to be instead of being bored.
When people are bored, it is primarily with their own selves that they are bored.
The ear tends to be lazy, craves the familiar and is shocked by the unexpected; the eye, on the other hand, tends to be impatient, craves the novel and is bored by repetition.
Before you get bored of yourself try creativity in your life.
Life is never boring, but some people choose to be bored.
Boredom is a pleasing antidote for fear.
Boredom, the desire for desires.
Boredom is just the reverse side of fascination.
A bore is a man who, when you ask him how he is, tells you.
I just get bored really quickly and want to push myself to the next level.
I always get bored with my hair. That's why I would always change it throughout my career.
I always think boredom is to some extent the fault of the bored.
The penalty for success is to be bored by the people who used to snub you.
A bored Gwenvael is an entire town destroyed accidently.
The writer's curse is that even in solitude, no matter its duration, he never grows lonely or bored.
Only those who want everything done for them are bored.
